name: Bleed Fire
desc: Enemies will bleed fire when hit. Also creates a small fire area beneath each target and ignites surfaces in the area. Active for 3 turn(s).

name: Corpse Explosion
desc: Explode the target corpse, dealing physical damage in the area

name: Deploy Mass Traps
desc: Throw 4 explosive traps at target locations. Each trap takes a turn to activate. When active, trap will explode when a character approaches it.

name: Epidemic of Fire
desc: Fire a cursed flame that will fork on impact up to 5 times, dealing [X] Fire Damage and leaving a cursed fire surface in its wake. Sets Necrofire for 2 turn(s).

name: Fire Whip
desc: Long-range attack that deals [X] Fire Damage to a single target, leaving them blind and burning. Sets Blind for 1 turn and Burning for 1 turn.

name: Fireball
desc: Hurl a fiery sphere that will explode, dealing [X] Fire Damage. Set Burning for 2 turn(s).

name: Firebrand
desc: An aura that adds [X] fire damage to weapon skills and attacks for all allies within an 8m radius.

name: Flaming Crescendo
desc: Curse the target to explode (3m explode radius) in 1 turns or on death.

name: Flaming Tongues
desc: Flaming tongues protect you, immediately attacking approaching enemies. Sets Flaming Tongues for 3 turn(s).

name: Haste
desc: Sets Hasted on target character for 2 turn(s). Hasted increases movement speed by 2m per AP and gives an additional 1 AP per turn. Clears Slowed and Crippled.

name: Ignition
desc: Sets enemy characters around you on fire. Deals [X] fire damage to each. Ignites all susceptible surfaces for 2 turn(s).

name: Laser Ray
desc: Line of intense heat that deals [X] Fire Damage to characters and leaves fire clouds behind. Sets Burning for 2 turn(s).

name: Mass Corpse Explosion
desc: Explode all corpses around you, dealing physical damage in the area.

name: Mass Sabotage
desc: Explode 2 random grenades or arrows in the inventories of any enemy in a target circle.

name: Master of Sparks
desc: Target character and surrounding allies receive Sparkmaster status that adds a chance of fiery sparks to melee attacks. Sets Sparkmaster for 2 turn(s).

name: Meteor Shower
desc: 25 fireballs come crashing from the sky. Each does [X] Fire Damage within a 3m range from impact.

name: Peace of Mind
desc: Target gains Clear-Minded for 3 turn(s), which increases Strength, Finesse, Intelligence by 2 and Wits by 5. Removes Blinded, Terrified, Charmed, Taunted, Sleeping, Enraged and Mad.

name: Sabotage
desc: If target character is carrying grenades or arrows, a random one explodes in their inventory. Explodes 1 random Arrow(s) or Grenade(s) on target's inventory.

name: Searing Daggers
desc: Shoot 3 flaming daggers at targets of your choice, each creating a fire surface and dealing [X] fire damage. Sets Burning for 2 turn(s).

name: Sparking Swings
desc: Receive Sparkstriker status for 3 turn(s). This causes your melee attacks to create a spark projectile that bounces off the initial target to hit the closest enemy. Has 4 charges.

name: Spontaneous Combustion
desc: Deal [X] Fire Damage to target character. If the character is affected by Burning or Necrofire, remove those statuses and deal additional damage for each turn of duration remaining.

name: Summon Fire Slug
desc: Summon a Fire Slug. Your Fire Slug can create fire surfaces and launch linear fire attacks. The stats of the summon will depend on the caster's level and summoning ability. Active for 5 turns.

name: Supernova
desc: Explode, creating fire surfaces and dealing [X] Fire Damage in a large area around you (except areas blocked by obstacles).

name: Throw Explosive Trap
desc: Throw an explosive trap at target locations. Trap takes a turn to activate. When active, trap will explode when a character approaches it.
